nodes.text: Satele Shan Boulevard was a street on the planet Coruscant that was situated within Pyochayarit, in the Azda Cluster region of the planet. During the reign of the Galactic Empire, the publishing company Anooba Press operated from Suite 44800 of the property 830-303 Satele Shan Boulevard located on the street.

Satele Shan Boulevard was first mentioned in The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett, a reference book published in 2013. The text was published from an in-universe perspective and Satele Shan Boulevard was mentioned within the address of the in-universe publisher of the Making a Killing supplement that accompanied the book.
